metadata.title: CVE-2024-52510 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: The Nextcloud Desktop Client is a tool to synchronize files from NextcloudServer with your computer. The Desktop client did not stop with an errorbut allowed by-passing the signature validation, if a manipulated serversends an empty initial signature. It is recommended that the NextcloudDesktop client is upgraded to 3.14.2 or later.

criterions.comment: nextcloud-desktop package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
